original_text: And when I was with you and needed something, I was not a burden to anyone, for the brothers who came from Macedonia supplied what I needed. I have kept myself from being a burden to you in any way, and will continue to do so.
korean_text: 또 내가 너희와 함께 있을 때 비용이 부족하였으되 아무에게도 누를 끼치지 아니하였음은 마게도냐에서 온 형제들이 나의 부족한 것을 보충하였음이라 내가 모든 일에 너희에게 폐를 끼치지 않기 위하여 스스로 조심하였고 또 조심하리라

sentences.original_text: And when I was with you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 너희와 함께 있을 때

sentences.original_text: I was not a burden to anyone
for the brothers who came from Macedonia
I have kept myself from being a burden to you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희에게 부담이 되지 않도록 스스로를 지켜왔다

sentences.original_text: and will continue to do so
